BR.name: Hello Kitty and Sanrio Friends 3D Racing
BR.description: É uma corrida do arco-íris divertido para a linha de chegada com Olá Kitty e seus amigos super cute! Dirija carros, aviões e barcos através de ambientes 3D, incluindo Tropical Ilha do Chococat, Galaxy Little Stars Gêmeas 'e do Olá Kitty Happy Town. Competir contra nove outros pilotos como você pegar cool power-ups, em seguida, desbloquear 20 diferentes mini-jogos que irão desafiar suas habilidades. Personalize os seus veículos e equipamentos de caracteres para tornar o jogo o seu próprio. Jogue como seus personagens favoritos, incluindo Sanrio Olá Kitty, My Melody, Keroppi, Badtz-Maru e muito mais!

CA.name: Hello Kitty and Sanrio Friends 3D Racing
CA.description: It’s a fun rainbow race to the finish line with Hello Kitty and her super cute friends! Drive cars, planes and boats through 3D environments including Chococat’s Tropical Island, Little Twin Stars’ Galaxy and Hello Kitty’s Happy Town. Compete against 9 other racers as you pick up cool power-ups, then unlock 20 different mini games that will challenge your skills. Customize your vehicles and character outfits to make the game your own. Play as your favorite Sanrio characters including Hello Kitty, My Melody, Keroppi, Badtz-Maru and many more!

MX.name: Hello Kitty and Sanrio Friends 3D Racing
MX.description: Es una carrera de arco iris de la diversión de la línea de meta con Hello Kitty y sus amigos super lindo! Conducir coches, aviones y barcos a través de entornos en 3D, incluyendo la isla tropical de Chococat, Galaxy Estrellitas Gemelas y de Hello Kitty Happy Town. Compite contra otros 9 corredores como recoger cool power-ups, a continuación, desbloquear 20 mini juegos diferentes que pondrán a prueba tus habilidades. Personaliza tus vehículos y trajes de personajes para hacer el juego a su propio. Juega con tus personajes favoritos de Sanrio incluyendo Hello Kitty, My Melody, Keroppi, Badtz-Maru y muchos más!

US.name: Hello Kitty and Sanrio Friends 3D Racing
US.description: It’s a fun rainbow race to the finish line with Hello Kitty and her super cute friends! Drive cars, planes and boats through 3D environments including Chococat’s Tropical Island, Little Twin Stars’ Galaxy and Hello Kitty’s Happy Town. Compete against 9 other racers as you pick up cool power-ups, then unlock 20 different mini games that will challenge your skills. Customize your vehicles and character outfits to make the game your own. Play as your favorite Sanrio characters including Hello Kitty, My Melody, Keroppi, Badtz-Maru and many more!
